prompts: Create a whimsical grass-type Pokemon with fluffy white features and vibrant green accents.
I want a playful Pokemon that resembles a cotton ball and loves to frolic in fields.
Generate a tiny Pokemon that has a cloud-like appearance and enjoys sunny weather.
Make an adorable fairy-type Pokemon that floats gracefully and spreads happiness.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in lush grasslands, with soft textures and bright colors.
Design a Pokemon that embodies nature's charm with its soft, cotton-like body and green leaves.
Show me a Pokemon with a gentle demeanor, perfect for a serene forest environment.
